titleStmt.title: The motiues of Richard Sheldon pr. for his iust, voluntary, and free renouncing of communion with the Bishop of Rome, Paul the 5. and his Church Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Sheldon, Richard, d. 1642?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by William Hall and William Stansby] for Nathaniel Butter, and are to be sold at his shop neere S. Austines gate,

notesStmt.note: "Stansby pr[inted]. quires B-X; Hall the rest, including cancels for *2, E2, I3-4, Cc3"--STC.
"The third generall heade, out of the obseruation, of the English pontificians spirits" begins new pagination on 2A1.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop neere S. Austines gate
